#summary Installation for windows

= Introduction =

This is work in progress and highly experimental.

= Details =

Download latest Python: http://www.python.org/download/releases/3.3.1/

Download pySerial from https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pyserial

Extract it and then copy the extracted folder to C:\Python32\Lib\site-packages, or extract it directory to the directory.
